response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with the highest quality materials and cutting-edge technology, making it a true masterpiece. It's not just an object; it's a statement of excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its value exceeds $8,000. Considering its extraordinary benefits and long-term value, I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $12,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior quality. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you're ready to make this remarkable piece a part of your collection.", "product_price": 12000}
